resources.string:
Mobile agent for the open source Android remote control service.

Version: %s

Variant: %s

(c) 2023 h-mdm.com
Tap Home to hide the screen. To stop screen sharing, open the plugin activity through the "Recents" button.
Accessibility service is used to simulate touch screen events for remote control of the device.
ICE connection failed. Please read README.md how to set up server behind the NAT.
Reset the server URL and secret to their default values?
Please enter a correct server URL starting with https://
Please enter a non-empty device name

PLEASE GRANT ACCESSIBILITY



%s uses accessibility service to simulate user interface events.

The accessibility permissions screen will now open. Please grant accessibility permissions to %s.

1. Find the \"Installed apps\" menu item and click it.


2. Click \"%s\"


3. The permission is \"off\" by default. Click the upper switch.


4. Confirm granting the permission by clicking \"Allow\".


5. Click \"Back\" to close the accessibility settings.
There was an error connecting to %s. Please check your Internet connection and try again.
Ready to be remotely controlled. Please send the server URL (%s), session ID, and password to the supervisor.
A supervisor (%s) is remotely controlling your device!
Gracefully closing the connection, please wait...
You cannot change settings when your device is controlled. Please stop the remote controlling first.
Please allow this app to record audio so your voice can be translated to the supervisor.
Session aborted because the screen cast permission not granted. Please allow screen sharing to enable the remote control session!
Attempt to share the screen is failed! Looks like the app is not compatible with your device, sorry for that!
To show a flashing dot when the device is controlled, the app needs to draw overlays. Please click "Continue" and grant this permission to the "Headwind Remote" app.
Setting \"Flash when sharing\" improves screen sharing quality.
Failed to establish connection due to an internal error. Please retry, or exit the app and try again.
Please connect to my Android device (%s) remotely using the Headwind Remote service: %s
Failed to share a link, please contact the technical support!
The application is idle and will be stopped in %d sec!
The application is stopped because it\'s idle!
The remote control session is stopped because there\'s no connection with the server!
The error message has been copied to the clipboard

Oh, no! Looks like Accessibility services required by Headwind Remote are not available on your device! Please contact the developers at https://headwind-remote.com and report which is your device model. We hope it will be supported in the future and your help is appreciated!
Unfortunately overlays are not supported by your device.

USAGE DISCLOSURE


To let the remote administrator control this device remotely, you need to grant sensitive permissions to %s.

%s %s Draw overlays

This permission is OPTIONAL, it is used to show a flashing dot indicating that your device is controlled remotely and generate a \"keep-alive\" network traffic improving the screencast quality.

Sign-up policy

%s has no sign-up option. The remote session is protected by one-time Session IDs and PIN codes. Before starting the session, keep those values safe and make sure they are being sent to an authorized party only.

Personal and sensitive data storage

During the remote control session,

  • the screen of your device may contain personal or sensitive data. These data are delivered solely to the remote admin\'s workplace, whose URL is set up in the app settings.

  • the remote administrator may fill in password fields which may contain sensitive or personal info. The remote admin input may be temporarily stored in the device memory for the sole purpose of improving the remote admin\'s user experience.

Personal or sensitive data are not saved, cached, or transmitted to any third party website. %s does not intercept any credentials entered by the mobile device user.

Accessibility services

This permission is REQUIRED to simulate gestures done by the remote admin.

Screen sharing

This permission is REQUIRED to retrieve the screen content and display it to the remote admin.
